1.text: And after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.

2.text: And he smote Moab; and the Moabites became servants to David, and brought presents.

3.text: And David smote Hadarezer king of Zobah unto Hamath, as he went to stablish his dominion by the river Euphrates.

4.text: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: and David houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for an hundred chariots.

5.text: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succour Hadarezer king of Zobah, David smote of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.

6.text: Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus; and the Syrians became servants to David, and brought presents. And the LORD gave victory to David whithersoever he went.

7.text: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.

8.text: And from Tibhath and from Cun, cities of Hadarezer, David took very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.

9.text: And when Tou king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer king of Zobah,

10.text: he sent Hadoram his son to king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadarezer and smitten him; for Hadarezer had wars with Tou; and he had with him all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass.

11.text: These also did king David dedicate unto the LORD, with the silver and the gold that he carried away from all the nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.

12.text: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah smote of the Edomites in the Valley of Salt eighteen thousand.

13.text: And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became servants to David. And the LORD gave victory to David whithersoever he went.

14.text: And David reigned over all Israel; and he executed judgment and justice unto all his people.

15.text: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder.

16.text: and Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were priests; and Shavsha was scribe;

17.text: and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.
